entry.title: Bonne Maman - Wild Blueberry Jam Mini Jars Kosher - 15 x 1 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bonne Maman
Type: BAKING
Price: 19.99

Add a touch of sweetness to your bakery, restaurant, or cafe with this Kosher honey..!

Now your patrons can satisfy their craving for something sweet on-the-go with the convenience of this honey! The name is highly recognized in just about any venue, and their premium selection of spreads upholds a tradition of full-bodied flavor, great quality, and value. These handy portion cups bring the syrupy sweetness and traditional taste of pure honey to your restaurant, diner, school cafeteria, or convenience store. Their 1 oz. size is perfectly-portioned for a single serving, and your customers can even grab them on the go with their take-out meals.

Honey offers a quick and easy way to enhance menu items with its pleasing aroma and sweet, classic taste. It's the perfect complement to toast, biscuits, hot teas, or spiced ciders. Rather than buying honey in bulk jars, these portion cups are easy to serve in caddies on your tabletop or hotel breakfast bar. Collected from sweet honey-comb and containing no additives, this honey provides just the right amount of satisfying sweetness to your customers' dishes.

entry.title: Ontario - Maple Syrup - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ontario
Type: FOOD
Price: 19.99

Ontario - Maple Syrup - 1 L

Whether you're serving up a hearty breakfast or a sweet, satisfying meal anytime throughout the day, you can be sure that this syrup is just the treat your patrons are looking for to complement their meal. This syrup combines the convenience you desire with the classic, sweet flavor that your customers crave. Drizzle atop a plentiful tower of pancakes or waffles for a sticky-sweet breakfast treat, or even pair it with powdered sugar, butter, or fruit toppings!

This syrup's delightful sweetness, traditional taste, and smooth consistency makes it a deliciously-indulgent accompaniment to a variety of breakfast services. The syrup can be placed on individual dining tables, but holds enough product to keep your hungry patrons in good supply - whether they like a lot or just a little syrup, this bottle has got it covered. The easy-pour opening offers a smooth, steady drizzle to keep the syrup from flooding out, while still evenly coating your breakfast dishes. The cap also helps to keep the syrup from spilling out if the bottle is accidentally knocked over, therefore preventing unwanted messes. Ideal for diners, restaurants, hotels, and more, this syrup is perfect for adding a smooth, sweet flavor to your most popular breakfast offerings.

entry.title: Dawn - Glucose Syrup 42DE - 27.22 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dawn
Type: BAKING
Price: 69.99

Dawn - Glucose Syrup 42DE - 27.22 (60 Lbs) Kg

 This is a high purity syrup often used in soft drinks, jelly or desserts. This is a popular ingredient often found in a wide variety of baked goods, candies and canned goods.

Aside from adding a sweet taste to the final product, it can also give some products a glossy finish and keep products soft and fresh. This food additive can be used in most recipes that require a touch of sweetness.

This item does not qualify for Expedited Parcel Shipping. You can place the order for pickup or Local Delivery.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: BAKING
Price: 74.99

Lynch - Golden Corn Syrup - 4 x 4 L

Lynch - Golden Corn Syrup has a mild flavour, perfect for candy making, caramel corn and sticky buns. Add to favourite cereal bars, barbecue sauce recipes, Asian stir fry sauces, or use to sweeten and thicken relishes and chutneys.

Shelf Life 540 Days

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Sweet golden corn syrup with a hint of blackstrap molasses.

USE IDEAS

Can be used on pancakes and waffles and is also a great choice for all your baking needs. Perfect for pecan pies and butter tarts.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Ready to use.

INGREDIENTS

Glucose, sugar, water, blackstrap molasses, salt.

entry.title: Crosby's - 100% Natural Gluten Free Fancy Molasses - 675 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crosby's
Type: BAKING
Price: 5.75

Crosby's - Fancy Molasses - 675 g

Add rich color, moisture, and a kick to your favorite recipes with this jar of molasses,  in order to create a rich, robust flavor. This molasses, unlike refined sugar, is packed with flavor and minerals such as calcium, magnesium, potassium, and iron. 

Give a healthy, semi-sweet flavor to dishes like gingerbread, muffins, pies and more, or add the perfect viscosity to baked beans, chili, and other savory sauces, offers the highest quality baking products made from the finest ingredients. This richly flavored, highly nutritional molasses comes in a sturdy jar.

Crosby’s fancy molasses is the highest grade of molasses, made from pure sugarcane juice that has been inverted into syrup (not unlike the maple syrup making process). The tangy-sweet flavour of Crosby’s is perfect for cookies, cakes, sauces, dressings, marinades and more. It is unsulfured, gluten-free and non-GMO. For wholesome recipes & free eBooks visit crosbys.com. Crosby’s is proudly Canadian and family owned.
- 100% natural
- no additives or preservatives.
- Gluten Free
- Non GMO Certified
- Produced in Peanut Free Facility
- Unsulfured
- Source of Iron
- Good source of Riboflavin
